text: in response to the question, "What's your superhero name and what would your superpowers be," what does Laura say?
answer: Laura says she would "One-Year-Older Woman," which would make her 16 and allow her to drive herself on family vacations.

text: in response to the question, "What's your superhero name and what would your superpowers be," what does Theo say?
answer: Theo says he would be "Only-Child Man," so he could live without Laura.

text: what is the name of the graphic novel that Theo is currently working on?
answer: Bob: The Boy With Perfect Memory

text: Where did the family vacation while their mom had terminal cancer?
answer: Disney World

answer: They are charged $30 to drive their car into the park.

answer: Thirty dollars

text: what does Theo's dad do for work?
answer: He is a high school science teacher.

text: how long is Theo a Boy Scout?
answer: He is a Boy Scout for only one week.

text: what do Theo and his family eat for dinner their first night in Big Bend?
answer: They ate microwaved hotdogs and Goldfish crackers.

text: What did the sign say at the beginning of the hiking trail?
answer: This is Bear Country

text: as the family begins their first day of hiking in Big Bend, Theo sees signs warning them of what specific danger?
answer: There are warning signs about bears.

text: what is the full name of the adult of the two strangers they encounter while hiking?
answer: The man's name is Leonard Blenard.

text: what is Leonard Blendard's son's name?
answer: He is Leonard Blendard, Jr., but prefers being called Leo.

text: who is Theo named after and what was the person known for?
answer: He was named after Theodore Maiman, the inventor of the laser.

text: what bird is Leonard Blenard looking for while hiking?
answer: He is looking for the elusive Colima warbler.

text: What is Leonard's "Big Year"?
answer: The year of their life to find and photograph as many different native  North American bird species as possible

text: what number of birds identified and photographed in one year would set a new world record?
answer: He has to photograph 785 different birds in one year to set the record.

text: what is the world record for the number of different native North American bird species photographed in one year?
what is Leo obsessed with, even on a hike in the wild?
answer: He is obsessed with social media and his numbers related to it (specifically his views on Instagram).

text: Whose tent did the family borrow for camping?
answer: Craig's

text: What does Leo call his viewers?
answer: Leo Baebies

text: what does Leo call his YouTube viewers?
answer: He calls them his Leo Baebies.

text: Where does Laura hit Leo when he sneaks over to her and Theo's tent during the night?

text: What time during the night does Leo try to get Laura to come out of her tent to talk with him?
why does Leo go to Theo and Laura's tent at 2:40 a.m.?
answer: He wanted Laura to kiss him.

text: what time is it when Leo comes to Laura’s tent in the middle of the night?
what does Theo notice at their campsite in the morning while Laura and his dad were discussing Leo?
answer: He noticed a black bear about 500 feet away from them.

text: what does Theo tell the others to do when they see the bear?
answer: He tells them to talk softly, pour water on the food and wave their arms around.

text: Who scared away the bird that Leonard had been searching for and trying to photograph
answer: Laura (with a sneeze)

answer: Seven to eight months

text: Where did dad meet Lucrecia?
answer: At college in a friend group with their mom

text: what are the two happiest days of Bob's life in Theo's graphic novel?
answer: Bob's happiest days are his 5th surprise birthday with Spongebob Squarepants and the day his mom picks him up from school early to take him to an R-rated movie.

text: what do Laura, Theo and their dad see when they arrive at Boquillas Hot Springs?
answer: They see an elderly French man and woman soaking naked and drinking wine.

answer: Bernard and Sylvie

text: what does Laura admit to Sylvie that shocks her Dad and Theo?

answer: Six

answer: Theo orders the most expensive item on the menu, which is a seasoned sirloin steak burrito with loaded nachos.

text: What was the name of the exhibit that had a telescope with a glued on cap?

text: what bothers Theo the most about his Dad's relationship with Lucrecia?
answer: He thinks his Dad isn't acting like himself, wearing clothing he never has and pretending to like things he never has in the past.

text: how does the relationship between Laura and Theo change after their mom's death?
answer: They used to talk and hang out, but they had become distant.

text: which board game do Theo and his family play on a rainy day while on vacation?
answer: The Game of Life

text: What river did the family kayak on?
answer: Rio Grande

text: what does Theo finally tell his Dad when he exploded on him near the end of the vacation?
answer: He was angry about his Dad never discussing things with him, including his Mom, and that he wanted Theo to answer personal questions from Lucrecia when he didn't even know her.

text: what do Laura and Theo do while eating pizza together the last night of vacation?
answer: They shared stories about their mom for two hours.

text: what do Stanley and Lucrecia decide when they meet the last night of the vacation?
answer: They decided they should take some time off from the relationship.

text: what doesTheo's dad realize he has done wrong with his relationship with Lucrecia?
answer: He moved too quickly and didn't consider his children's feelings.
